 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: namespace Ease\JQuery;
 4: 
 5: /**
 6:  * Odesílací tlačítko.
 7:  *
 8:  * @author Vítězslav Dvořák <vitex@hippy.cz>
 9:  *
10:  * @link   http://jqueryui.com/demos/button/
11:  */
12: class SubmitButton extends UIPart
13: {
14:     /**
15:      * Jméno tlačítka.
16:      *
17:      * @var string
18:      */
19:     public $name = null;
20: 
21:     /**
22:      * Paramatry pro jQuery .button().
23:      *
24:      * @var array
25:      */
26:     public $JQOptions = null;
27: 
28:     /**
29:      * Odkaz na objekt tlačítka.
30:      *
31:      * @var Ease\Html\InputSubmitTag
32:      */
33:     public $Button = null;
34: 
35:     /**
36:      * Odesílací tlačítko.
37:      *
38:      * @see   http://jqueryui.com/demos/button/
39:      *
40:      * @param string       $name
41:      * @param string       $value
42:      * @param string       $Title
43:      * @param array|string $JQOptions  parametry pro $.button()
44:      * @param array        $Properties vlastnosti HTML tagu
45:      */
46:     public function __construct($name, $value, $Title = null, $JQOptions = null,
47:                                 $Properties = null)
48:     {
49:         parent::__construct();
50:         $this->Name = $name;
51:         $this->JQOptions = $JQOptions;
52:         $Properties['title'] = $Title;
53:         $this->Button = $this->addItem(new \Ease\Html\InputSubmitTag($name,
54:             $value, $Properties));
55:     }
56: 
57:     /**
58:      * Nastaveni javascriptu.
59:      */
60:     public function onDocumentReady()
61:     {
62:         return '$("input[name='.$this->Name.']").button( {'.Part::partPropertiesToString($this->JQOptions).'} )';
63:     }
64: 
65:     /**
66:      * Nastaví classu tagu.
67:      *
68:      * @param string $ClassName
69:      */
70:     public function setTagClass($ClassName)
71:     {
72:         return $this->Button->setTagClass($ClassName);
73:     }
74: 
75:     /**
76:      * Nastaví jméno tagu.
77:      *
78:      * @param string $TagName
79:      */
80:     public function setTagName($TagName)
81:     {
82:         return $this->Button->setTagName($TagName);
83:     }
84: }
85:
